text: Kim Clijsters (; born 8 June 1983)is a Belgian retired tennis player. She used to be ranked as the World No. 1. On 22 August 2011 she was ranked third in the world. == References == Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:Olympians for Belgium Category:Female tennis players Category:World No. 1 tennis players Category:Belgian tennis players
title: Kim Clijsters
